TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents the simple binding between the property value of an object and the property value of a control.

span.span: Represents the simple binding between the property value of an object and the property value of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类来创建和维护控件的属性以及对象的属性或对象的列表中的当前对象的属性之间的简单绑定。Use the class to create and maintain a simple binding between the property of a control and either the property of an object, or the property of the current object in a list of objects. 作为第一种情况的示例，你可以将绑定属性控制转移到`FirstName`属性`Customer`对象。As an example of the first case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a `Customer` object. 作为第二个用例的示例，你可以将绑定属性控制转移到`FirstName`属性，其中包含客户。As an example of the second case, you can bind the property of a control to the `FirstName` property of a that contains customers. 类还使你可以通过显示的值设置格式事件和检索通过格式化的值事件。The class also enables you to format values for display through the event and to retrieve formatted values through the event. 在构造时实例与构造函数，你必须指定三个项：When constructing a instance with constructor, you must specify three items: - 要将绑定到的控件属性名称。The name of the control property to bind to. - 数据源。The data source. - 解析为列表或数据源中的属性导航路径。The navigation path that resolves to a list or property in the data source. 导航路径还用于创建对象的属性。The navigation path is also used to create the object's property. 首先，你必须指定你想要绑定到数据的控件属性的名称。First, you must specify name of the control property you want to bind the data to. 例如，若要显示中的数据控制，指定属性。For example, to display data in a control, specify the property. 其次，你可以作为数据源下, 表中指定任何一种类的实例。Second, you can specify an instance of any one of the classes in the following table as the data source. 第三，你必须指定导航路径中，可以是空字符串 ("")，单个属性名称或句点分隔层次结构的名称。Third, you must specify the navigation path, which can be an empty string (""), a single property name, or a period-delimited hierarchy of names. 如果你设置的导航路径为空字符串，将在基础数据源对象上调用方法。If you set the navigation path to an empty string, the method will be called on the underlying data source object. 如果数据源是，其中可以包含多个对象的导航路径必须用于将解析为特定列。If the data source is a , which can contain multiple objects, the navigation path must be used to resolve to a specific column. > [!NOTE] > 数据源时， ，或，实际上绑定到。When the data source is a , , or , you are actually binding to a . 因此，绑定的行是实际对象。Consequently, the bound rows are actually objects. 数据源设置为包含多个对象时需要句点分隔的导航路径对象 (如或)。A period-delimited navigation path is required when the data source is set to an object that contains multiple objects (such as a or ). 绑定到其属性将返回对其他对象 （如具有返回其他类对象的属性的类） 的引用的对象时，还可以使用句点分隔的导航路径。You can also use a period-delimited navigation path when you bind to an object whose properties return references to other objects (such as a class with properties that return other class objects). 例如，以下所有的导航路径描述有效的数据字段：For example, the following navigation paths all describe valid data fields: - "Size.Height""Size.Height" - "Suppliers.CompanyName""Suppliers.CompanyName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName""Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" - "Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity""Regions.regionsToCustomers.customersToOrders.ordersToDetails.Quantity" 路径的每个成员可以返回一个属性，可解析为单个值 （如整数），或者值 （如字符串的数组） 的列表。Each member of the path can return either a property that resolves to a single value (such as an integer), or a list of values (such as an array of strings). 尽管列表或属性，则可能是在路径中的每个成员，最终成员必须解析为一个属性。Although each member in the path can be a list or property, the final member must resolve to a property. 每个成员上的上一个成员生成:"Size.Height"解析为属性当前;"Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName"解析为第一个名称对于当前的客户，其中客户是一个客户的当前区域。Each member builds on the previous member: "Size.Height" resolves to the property for the current ; "Regions.regionsToCustomers.CustomerFirstName" resolves to the first name for the current customer, where the customer is one of the customers for the current region. A通过链接一个返回值的列表第二个中。A returns a list of values by linking one to a second in a . 如果包含对象，你可以指定将数据成员跟，，然后。If the contains objects, you can specify the data member as a followed by a , and then a . 例如，如果名为"供应商"包含名为"suppliers2products"，数据成员可能是"Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName"。For example, if the named "Suppliers" contains a named "suppliers2products", the data member could be "Suppliers.suppliers2products.ProductName". 数据源可由一组相关的类组成。The data source can consist of a set of related classes. 例如，假设太阳系进行编录的一组类。For example, imagine a set of classes that catalogs solar systems. 名为的类`System`包含名为的属性`Stars`返回的集合`Star`对象。The class named `System` contains a property named `Stars` that returns a collection of `Star` objects. 每个`Star`对象具有`Name`和`Mass`属性，以及一个`Planets`返回的集合的属性`Planet`对象。Each `Star` object has `Name` and `Mass` properties, as well as a `Planets` property that returns a collection of `Planet` objects. 在此系统中，每个行星还具有`Mass`和`Name`属性。In this system, each planet also has `Mass` and `Name` properties. 每个`Planet`进一步对象具有`Moons`返回的集合的属性`Moon`对象，其中每个还有`Name`和`Mass`属性。Each `Planet` object further has a `Moons` property that returns a collection of `Moon` objects, each of which also has `Name` and `Mass` properties. 如果指定`System`对象作为数据源，则可以将任意以下指定为数据成员：If you specify a `System` object as the data source, you can specify any of the following as the data member: - "Stars.Name""Stars.Name" - "Stars.Mass""Stars.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Name""Stars.Planets.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Mass""Stars.Planets.Mass" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Name""Stars.Planets.Moons.Name" - "Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass""Stars.Planets.Moons.Mass" 可以是简单绑定的控件功能的集合中的对象，这可以通过控件的访问属性。Controls that can be simple-bound feature a collection of objects in a , which you can access through the control's property. 你添加到通过调用集合方法，从而对对象的属性 （或列表中的当前对象的属性） 绑定控件的属性。You add a to the collection by calling the method, thereby binding a property of the control to a property of an object (or to a property of the current object in a list). 你可以简单绑定到派生自任何对象类，例如，以下的 Windows 控件：You can simple-bind to any object that derives from the class, for example, the following Windows controls: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - > [!NOTE] > 仅属性， ，和控件是简单绑定。Only the property of the , , and control is simple bound. 类是一个抽象类，管理所有为特定数据源和数据成员的对象。The class is an abstract class that manages all the objects for a particular data source and data member. 派生自的类是和类。Classes that derive from are the and the classes. 如何管理取决于是否列表绑定或属性绑定。How a is managed depends on whether the is a list binding or a property binding. 例如，如果它是一个列表绑定，你可以使用指定在列表中; ，因此，确定哪一项 （不在列表中的所有项） 实际绑定到控件。For example, if it is a list binding, you can use the to specify a in the list; the , therefore, determines which item (out of all items in the list) is actually bound to a control. 返回适当，使用。To return the appropriate , use the . 若要将新行添加到一组控件绑定到同一，使用方法类。To add a new row to a set of controls bound to the same , use the method of the class. 使用属性类返回相应。Use the property of the class to return the appropriate . 若要避免添加新行，使用方法。To escape the addition of the new row, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用演示简单数据绑定的多个控件创建一个 Windows 窗体。The following code example creates a Windows Form with several controls that demonstrate simple data binding. 该示例创建包含两个表名为`Customers`和`Orders`，和一个名为`custToOrders`。The example creates a with two tables named `Customers` and `Orders`, and a named `custToOrders`. 四个控件 (和三个控件) 的数据绑定到表中的列。Four controls (a and three controls) are data bound to columns in the tables. 为每个控件，该示例创建并添加到控制通过属性。For each control, the example creates and adds a to the control through the property. 此示例将返回通过窗体的每个表。The example returns a for each table through the form's . 四个控制递增或递减属性对象。Four controls increment or decrement the property on the objects. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以指定任何用于数据源的以下类的实例：You can specify an instance of any of the following classes for the data source: - - - - - - 实现任何类接口Any class that implements the interface - 任何类Any class 请参阅有关创建的详细信息的类`dataMember`字符串。See the class for more information about creating the `dataMember` string. 当创建绑定到控件的属性，新检查公开的绑定的控件事件并将附加到两个特定事件：When you create a binding to a control's property, the new inspects the events exposed by the bound control and attaches to two particular events: - - 名为事件*PropertyName* `Changed` (例如， )An event named *PropertyName*`Changed` (for example, ) 如果您尝试绑定到的属性。 不存在，时将引发添加到控件的集合。If you attempt to bind to a property that does not exist, an will be thrown when the is added to the control's collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将绑定控件添加到中的表列名为`myDataSet`。The following code example binds a control to a table column in a named `myDataSet`. 该示例需要您声明的`myDataSet`模块的声明部分中。The example requires that you have declared `myDataSet` in the declarations section of the module. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Binding Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Binding Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BindingComplete As BindingCompleteEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the property is set to and a binding operation is complete, such as when data is pushed from the control to the data source or vice versa

span.span: Occurs when the property is set to and a binding operation is complete, such as when data is pushed from the control to the data source or vice versa

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以下任一下将引发此事件时的条件是`true`:This event is raised under any of the following conditions when is `true`: - 从数据源的数据将被推送到控件属性。Data from the data source is pushed onto the control property. - 从控件属性的数据推送到数据源。Data from the control property is pushed onto the data source. 在完成这些操作，独立的完成状态的情况下，将引发此事件。This event is raised at the completion of these operations, independent of the completion status. 例如，如果绑定操作将绑定到一个 null 值属性，将引发异常，但仍发生事件。For example, if a binding operation binds a null value to a property, an exception is thrown, but the event still occurs. 此事件的处理程序可以采取相应的措施，基于成功、 错误或异常在绑定过程中，通过检查属性参数。The handler of this event can take the appropriate action, based on the success, error, or exceptions in the binding process, by examining the property of the parameter. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnectorBindingComplete/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Format As ConvertEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the property of a control is bound to a data value.

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is bound to a data value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据从数据源推送到控件时引发事件。The event is raised when data is pushed from the data source into the control. 你可以处理事件将未格式化的数据转换从数据源到格式化显示的数据。You can handle the event to convert unformatted data from the data source into formatted data for display. 数据请求，则它从控件到数据源，引发事件来取消格式化显示的值，则事件发生重新格式化显示的数据。When data is pulled from the control into the data source, the event is raised to unformat the displayed value, then the event occurs to reformat the data for display. 这可确保该绑定的控件显示的格式正确的数据，而不考虑用户是否在控件中输入格式化或非格式化的数据。This ensures that the bound control displays correctly formatted data regardless of whether the user enters formatted or unformatted data in the control. 和事件允许你创建自定义格式来显示数据。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果表中的数据的类型，你可以在本地货币的格式显示数据，通过设置属性到中的格式化值事件。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can display the data in the local currency format by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此必须取消它们中的显示的值事件。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 事件会发生值更改，其中包括：The event occurs whenever the value of the changes, which includes: - 第一次绑定的属性。The first time the property is bound. - 任何时候更改。Any time the changes. - 每当数据绑定列表是排序或筛选，即完成时向该列表提供。Whenever the data-bound list is sorted or filtered, which is accomplished when a supplies the list. 事件也会发生后事件。The event also occurs after the event. 例如，当控件失去焦点时，将分析其内容。For example, when a control loses focus, its contents are parsed. 之后，当新数据推入到该控件，事件发生允许要设置格式的新内容。Immediately afterward, as new data is pushed into the control, the event occurs allowing the new contents to be formatted. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，将添加委托和事件，并将添加到的通过控制属性。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and adds the to the of a control through the property. `DecimalToCurrencyString`事件委托，添加到事件，设置绑定的值的格式 (类型) 作为货币使用方法。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, added to the event, formats the bound value (a type) as currency using the method. `CurrencyStringToDecimal`事件委托，添加到事件，将由控件显示的值转换回类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. 此示例假定存在名为`ds`。This example assumes the presence of a named `ds`. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.Format Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.Format Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源必须包含为属性才能正确应用。The data source must contain for the property to be correctly applied. 如果数据源类型是一个类型例如字符串或整数的值属性将被忽略。If the data source type is a type such as a string or integer the value of the property will be ignored. 此外，如果设置为忽略属性`null`。Also, the property is ignored if it is set to `null`. Null 值将添加到数据源，如果控件属性设置为的对象。A null value will be added to the data source when the control property is set to the object of . 如果设置为字符串值，比较不区分大小写。If is set to a string value, comparisons are case-insensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

value.span: 要绑定到的控件属性的名称。

span.span: The name of a control property to bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定你想要绑定到数据源中的列表的控件属性。Use the to specify the control property that you want to bind to a list in a data source. 通常情况下，等绑定的显示属性属性控件。Most commonly, you bind a display property such as the property of a control. 但是，由于可以将绑定控件的任何属性，你可以以编程方式创建控件在运行时使用数据库中的数据。However, because you can bind any property of a control, you can programmatically create controls at run time using data from a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例输出每个值为窗体上的每个控件。The following code example prints the value of each for each control on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Binding.PropertyName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Binding.PropertyName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReadValue() cil managed

summary.span: Sets the control property to the value read from the data source.

span.span: Sets the control property to the value read from the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteValue() cil managed

summary.span: Reads the current value from the control property and writes it to the data source.

span.span: Reads the current value from the control property and writes it to the data source.
